Text:
This is most probably again a useless rar file with another password protected rar file in it, and they want you to click on ads again and again, but you never get the password, and the rar file contains nothing but garbage anyway.

Download at your own peril !

This HUGE download asks for a password...if you don't have the password, it downloads the files anyway BUT the files will NOT play!

Don't waste your time and ask the admin folks to REMOVE this crap.

As others have mentioned, this is BS.  Just a huge, slow download and a RAR that opens yet another RAR with a text files telling you to get a password that doesn't exist.

This should be removed from TPB.
